post.body: Well, even just jamming would be kick ass fun.
Let's get in touch when I'm back in CGN. I'd love to play in a band again. Stoner rock suits my tastes perfectly. :)
Count me in! Kyuss is one of my all time favorite bands!
Will do. I play the guitar too, btw. You probably enjoy Motorpsycho, Kyuss, We, Primal Scream, etc... too? :)
So we're not the only ones. Cool. :)
Quick! Trademark it before someone else does! ;)
Thanks! I hope you are enjoying the season too.
I don't have a middle name. Somtimes I wish I had one, though. Sounds more assasin / serial killer interesting like. ;)
Do not like the walled garden of Facebook, nor the sloppy UX. Has brought me closer in touch with both old and new friends tho.
Facebook has some basic usability issues, yes - and yes it's boring if your fbook friends = say, ur twitter followers only.
I find Facebook is great for getting back in touch with not so tech savvy and/or early adopter friends and family, though.
Not exotic enough for a non conductive pencil and normal NO/DE/EU socket. Learned that from T-Systems UK senior management. ;)
If I like the UK or if I'm like it? ;) I love the UK (polite exception to cuisine). E.g. best humor and football in the world.
#Boarding AMS
Thank you for your consideration.
I admire your spirit, but I think video comments is inherently not going to fly. Did/will ever video telephony? It's human.. .
Grooving out to Milt Jackson's 'I'm not so sure'. Milt kicks ass.
BTW: It occured to me today that Douglas Adams' 42 could mean 'Death Guarranteed' in Chinese. Would certainly make for a message.
Mmmm.. . Norwegian xmas pepper cookies. NOM NOM NOM.
So.. . Are there any twitter people in Stavanger? We are wondering.
Listening to Ladyhawke. http://tinyurl.com/8qsfb8 I hope there's a concert in CGN soon.
Geeking it out. All sitting here with netbooks drinking, chatting and streaming centimeters across the table. Yay!
Drinking Norwegian xmas brew with friends.
Drinking beer with friend in Stavanger, Norway. Good times!
Boarding for SVG, Norway at AMS.
At AMS in transit. Two hours to kill. Anyone else here? Want to grab a coffee?
Boarding for AMS.
Wondering what has changed in Norway - except the loss of value of NOK to EUR - since the last time.
Catching up on two weeks of mail at the castle. #Mondays #work
Feeling good about being back in Cologne.
Just bought a power socket adaptor. Killing time in AMS gadget store is dangerous. Now I need to find exotic socket spot for next trip. :P
In transfer at AMS waiting for flight to CGN.
Sitting at Stavanger airport SVG waiting for my flight back to CGN via AMS.
Yay! dEUS live perforrmance at Paradiso, Amsterdam http://tinyurl.com/9eqozl
Just back from my uncle's funeral. At wake with closest family.
Booking a rountrip with KLM to CGN from SVG is 50% cheaper than one way. Go figure.
I blogged again: In loving memory of my uncle, Torodd Olsen: The night before Christmas 24.12.20.. http://tinyurl.com/7lxjxh
Missing my gf - and my guitars - as Kyuss is still setting the soundtrack to 2009. I want more time to play in this year.
I uploaded some images to perhaps help me in the mourning process. My uncle was in many ways my role model. http://tinyurl.com/9c5oyd
It's not the fireworks - it's the eeePC smelling of blue smoke. Woops. Kyuss initiating the new year on the eee's speakers.
